title: Yesterday Shutting Down - David Ryan Harris + Scary Pockets
description:
New vinyl alert: Pockets Presents: David Ryan Harris! Preorders begin TODAY at https://www.scarypocketsfunk.com
Get tickets to see us on tour with David Ryan Harris! https://www.scarypocketsfunk.com

A live funk version of David Ryan Harris' "Yesterday Shutting Down" with Scary Pockets.

MUSICIAN CREDITS
Vocals: David Ryan Harris
Guitar: Ryan Lerman
Bass: Sean Hurley
Organ: Larry Goldings
Keys: Charles Jones
Drums: Lemar Carter
Saxaphone: Bob Reynolds
Trumpet: CJ Camerieri

AUDIO CREDITS

VIDEO CREDITS

Video Assistant: Po Han Su
Editor: Adam Kritzberg

Recorded LIVE at The Village Studios in Los Angeles, CA.
